title: Warning alerts v3: Implement driver extraction + ranking for slippage/loss alerts

sections.text: Build the alert “drivers” pipeline that takes the v3 risk scoring output and produces a ranked list of contributing factors (e.g., stage duration, next-step missing, activity decay, close date movement, low fit score) with per-driver impact and supporting evidence fields. Ensure drivers are normalized across CRMs (Salesforce/HubSpot) and returned in a stable schema for downstream recommendations/UI. Include unit tests for ranking determinism and null/missing-field handling.
